de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.client

Interface IClientWorkCancel


  • public interface IClientWorkCancel
    This methods are called if the operator breaks or continues the work. ClientArbeitunterbrechen.java

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void postWorkingPause(int operatorId, String loginname)
      Will be called after the work has been suspended
      boolean preWorkingPause(int operatorId, String loginname)
      Is called before the work will be suspended by operator.

    • Method Detail

      • preWorkingPause

        boolean preWorkingPause(int operatorId,
                      String loginname)
        Is called before the work will be suspended by operator.
        Parameters:
        operatorId - - id of the current operator
        loginname - - login name of operator
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the operator has the permission to break the work, false otherwise

      • postWorkingPause

        Will be called after the work has been suspended
        Parameters:
        operatorId - - id of operator
        loginname - - login name of operator
